title: Worth getting the tech preview of Windows 10?
body:
Hmm, so first off, anyone from Windows 7 and 8 can get a free upgrade to Windows 10. However, there has been some bugs or something similar such as League isn't updated to Windows 10 so that doesn't allow players to play League, is this true? I wouldn't mind having Windows 10 on my PC although I won't be able to play League if this true information (that league does not work on windows 10). Also I didn't know where to put this thread under so yeah...

Happy feeding, summoners!

replies.body:
I've upgraded my computer to Windows 10 Pro and I've got some issues. I can run the game in different compatibility modes. If I use the game without compatibility mode I can launch it, login, join a quque and select a champion. But the game won't actually load and I have to close it and switch over to High DPI Scaling mode which in turn will give me a black login screen and black PVP.net screen. I can kinda guess where the password text box is and login and then hover around to click the Reconnect button. The game loads in and I can play.

This is a very tedious and annoying method but I haven't found any other solution. The game did work properly before the recent patch.
Windows 10 (Final) is out and runs league fine on my PC
